store_info.description_short: Read and to-read list book tracker
description_long: This app main purpose is to track what you have read, what you are reading and what you want to read.
It acts as a self hosted "personal Goodreads" because I became tired of switching providers every time an online service was shut.
All your data is now located into a single-file database which can be saved anywhere.
hint: This app uses a lot of resources and slows down your Portal while running.
